BOX.TITLE: External Bonus Game Configuration
BOX.DESCRIPTION: The ability to link an external bonus games provider to a bonus and produce a unique link for a player when a bonus is redeemed.

PROVIDER.NAME: Game Provider
PROVIDER.DESCRIPTION: Select the external bonus games provider from the list.

CAMPAIGNID.NAME: Internal Campaign Id
CAMPAIGNID.DESCRIPTION: This is the campaign id allocated in the provider configuration tab in domains configuration.
